WeyCoin
Don't let your memes be dreams
Say more Senpai

WeyCoin

Make memes. Get paid. We show you de wey, brudda.

Meme Use

Creating initiative for users to create new, fresh, spicy memes. With our applications and our WEY COIN users may 'tip' meme creators, with WEY COIN.

iOS & Android

iOS and Android mobile applications to allow users to simply press one or two buttons, and tip someone to show dem de wey

Web Security

Keep de Queen secure, bruddas. SegWit 4x, Atomic Swap, Lightning Network & Masternode Compatibility. We are not a shitcoin.

Roadmap

Welcome to our Roadmap. Dis is where we will show you our wey.

  • Jan-March 2018

    Q1 2018 Wallet Development

    Q1 2018 will hold all wallet platforms fully functional. (Win/Linux/macOSX/Web,Android,iOS)

  • Jan - March 2018

    Q1 2018 Exchange Applications

    We show our Bruddas de wey to our Queen. Sniffff ah, Binance. There she is, our Queen my Bruddas!!! Lettuce get to de exchange bruddas.

  • April - June

    Q2 - Development

    Begin development on V1 of the Proof of Meme implementation, the meme tipping mechanism.

  • July - December

    Q4 - WeyCoin Development

    Expansion of the WeyCoin development team and continued developmental work on the WeyCoin project, and applications

  • January - March 2019

    Q1 - Proof of Meme

    V2 - Development for receiving a percentage of every mined block for your shares, likes (clucks) or dislikes (spits) on a prive meme platform.

  • 2020 Onward

    Complete DOMINATION

    COMPLETE AND UTTER WORLD DOMINATION FOR MAKE COUNTRY UGANDA GREAT AND BRING HARVEST GOOD TO DE CROPS.

  • Dis Is
    DE
    WEY!!!
